## EthersMosaic.connect() method

Connect to the Mosaic protocol and create an `EthersMosaic` object.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static connect(signerOrProvider: EthersSigner | EthersProvider, optionalParams?: EthersMosaicConnectionOptionalParams): Promise<EthersMosaic>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  signerOrProvider | [EthersSigner](./lib-ethers.etherssigner.md) \| [EthersProvider](./lib-ethers.ethersprovider.md) | Ethers <code>Signer</code> or <code>Provider</code> to use for connecting to the Ethereum network. |
|  optionalParams | [EthersMosaicConnectionOptionalParams](./lib-ethers.ethersmosaicconnectionoptionalparams.md) | Optional parameters that can be used to customize the connection. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[EthersMosaic](./lib-ethers.ethersmosaic.md)<!-- -->&gt;
